ResourceHeader.Description: VLF-magnetic components (North-South and East-West) originated from lightning discharges received at Pontianak station, Indonesia. Tweek atmospherics are VLF/ELF electromagnetic waves that are originated from lightning discharges and propagate in the Earth-ionosphere waveguide over long distances (several thousand kilometers).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: When you use the raw data, you have to participate our consortium. Please contact us. When the data is used in or contributes to a presentation or publication, you should make acknowledgement. Parameter.Name: tt2000
Parameter.Description: Time label in CDF_TT2000 (the number of nano seconds since J2000 (2000-01-01T12:00:00)

Parameter.Name: time_50us
Parameter.Description: Year, month, day, hour, minute, second, milisecond, and microsecond of each time frame
